text: Vicente Rocafuerte y Bejarano (May 1, 1783 - May 16, 1847) was an influential figure in Ecuadorian politics. He served as President of Ecuador from September 10, 1834 to January 31, 1839. Rocafuerte was born into an aristocratic family in Guayaquil, Ecuador on May 1, 1783. During his youth, was sent to Madrid to finish his education. He returned to Ecuador in 1807. Rocafuerte died on May 16, 1847 in Lima, Peru from complications of a fever. He was 64 years old. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1783 births Category:1847 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Vicente Rocafuerte
